basics.name: Isabelle Castro
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student at the University of Hawaii at Manoa pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science. I expect to graduate Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Provide tutoring services for UH students taking ICS 101 / 110P / 111 / 211 / 212
highlights: Assist students in Java, Python, C, C++, and Microsoft Excel
Communicate complex programming concepts clearly, adapting to students' skill levels to enhance understanding
Manage time effectively by balancing tutoring duties with academic coursework and deadlines
Maintain and organize tutoring data and records using Microsoft Excel, ensuring smooth administrative operations
Meet with and discuss student improvement with Computer Science professors
